Title: Requires that the city council appoint members to, designate the chairman of, fill vacancies of and remove members of the rent guidelines board
Summary: Requires that the city council appoint members to, designate the chairman of, fill vacancies of and remove members of the rent guidelines board.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-510, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that the city council appoint members to, designate the chairman of, fill vacancies of and remove members of the rent guidelines board
